Description: LETTER FROM AXEL HOLM DATED JULY 9 – 1948, TO KAROLINE HOLM, 108 WEST 5TE STREET, DELL RAPIDS, SO DAKOTA, U.S.A.  THE ENVELOPE HAS A DEEP RUSTY RED 80 ØRE STAMP WITH THE TEXT –THE NORWEGIAN FOREST ASSOCIATION 1898 1948– AND –AXEL HEIBERG 1848 1932–.  THIS STAMP CAME OUT JUNE 15-1948 IN CONNECTION WITH THE 50 YEARS JUBILEE OF THE ASSOCIATION, AND AT THE SAME TIME THE 100 YEARS ANNIVERSARY FOR THE BIRTH OF THE FOUNDER, AXEL HEIBERG.  THE STAMP IS WORTH ABOUT $ 15 TODAY, IF IT'S ON A LETTER.
Title: Axel Holm to Karoline Holm 1948.7.9
